info.name: Mustakbaly Learning Module API
info.description: Complete API collection for Mustakbaly Learning Management System. Learning Module endpoints (Course Types, Courses, Units, Lessons, Enrollments) do NOT require authentication for testing. Authentication endpoints require JWT.

request.description: Authenticate user and receive JWT token
Register a new user
Get the authenticated user's information
Refresh the JWT token
Logout and invalidate the JWT token
Retrieve a paginated list of all course types

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Professional Development",
    "slug": "professional-development",
    "description": "Courses for professional skill development",
    "is_active": true,
    "target_audience": "Working professionals"
}

request.description: Create a new course type
Get a specific course type by ID
Update a course type
Delete a course type
Activate a course type
Deactivate a course type
Retrieve a paginated list of all courses

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Introduction to Laravel",
    "slug": "introduction-to-laravel",
    "description": "Learn the fundamentals of Laravel framework",
    "objectives": "Understand Laravel basics, routing, and MVC pattern",
    "prerequisites": "Basic PHP knowledge",
    "course_type_id": 1,
    "expected_duration_hours": 40,
    "language": "en",
    "status": "draft",
    "min_score_to_pass": 70,
    "is_offline_available": false,
    "course_delivery_type": "self_paced",
    "difficulty_level": "beginner"
}

request.description: Create a new course
Get a specific course by ID
Update a course
Delete a course
Publish a course
Unpublish a course
Change course status (draft, review, published, archived)
Check if a course can be published
Get list of courses available for enrollment
Assign an instructor to a course
Remove an instructor from a course
Set a primary instructor for a course
Unset the primary instructor for a course
Get all instructors for a course
Get all courses taught by a specific instructor
Retrieve a paginated list of all units
Create a new unit
Get a specific unit by ID
Update a unit
Delete a unit
Calculate the total duration of a unit

item.name: Check if Unit Can Be Deleted

request.description: Check if a unit can be safely deleted
Get all units for a specific course
Reorder units within a course
Get the count of units for a course
Move a unit to a specific position
Retrieve a paginated list of all lessons
Create a new lesson
Get a specific lesson by ID
Update a lesson
Delete a lesson
Calculate the total duration of a lesson

item.name: Check if Lesson Can Be Deleted

request.description: Check if a lesson can be safely deleted
Get all lessons for a specific unit
Reorder lessons within a unit
Get the count of lessons for a unit
Move a lesson to a specific position
Retrieve a paginated list of all enrollments
Create a new enrollment (enroll a learner in a course)
Get a specific enrollment by ID
Update enrollment status (active, suspended, completed, cancelled)
Reactivate a suspended or cancelled enrollment
Get the progress information for an enrollment
